Alarms Display and Storage
==========================

### Side Panel

The status of each alarm is shown in the PAMGuard GUI side panel.

### User Display

A list of recent alarms can be shown in a [User Display panel](../../../displays/userDisplayHelp/docs/userDisplayPanel.html) (the same PAMGuard modules you use for spectrograms).

Once you've created a user display panel, from the display menu, select "New Alarm history" and a panel containing a table of alarm events will appear.

  
![Alarm history](./images/AlarmHistory.png)  
  

### Output

Alarm events will be written to the [PAMGuard Database.](../../../utilities/generalDatabaseHelp/docs/database_database.html)
